transcripts.text: Did he say why he left the church?
He posted a link to the CES letter.
Yeah, my brother who left the church talks about it all the time.  That's the only thing he can say.
I swear it's like a new book of scripture or something.

Oh, it is.  And also, like, why did they all post about it?  It's like, can't they think for themselves?  Isn't that what they're all about?  And yet they all just like, parrot the words of somebody else.

Yeah, exactly.  Like why would you trust some guy who's like obviously against the church versus like actual sources?  Do you know what I mean?  Like I'm not going to trust like a biased, hateful, like, Do you know what I mean?  And I've heard it's like just like super like tons of holes and like he like lies in there a ton.

I've heard it's not even like well written, like you can't even... Yeah, you like can't get through it.  You're just like, well, this is what's just written by a fifth grader.  It's amazing that people can't even...
It's crazy.  It's Satan, I guess.
Also, there's like three debunkings now.  So I'm like, it's been debunked.  Stop posting.
What'd they say in the debunking?  I haven't read it.  Oh.
